General.Name: Jiangxi Yuean Advanced Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Yuean Advanced Materials Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells metal products. It offers carbonyl iron powder, soft magnetic material powder, atomized alloy powder, metal injection molding feedstock, 3D printing alloy powder, microwave absorption materials, carbon nanotubes, conductive nickel powder, and amorphous powder. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Ganzhou, China.
